description.narrative: The Australian Government and the Asian Development Bank (ADB) will partner to identify, pilot, and scale innovative tourism business models in emerging ASEAN-4 markets co-inhabiting the Mekong (Cambodia, Lao PDR, Myanmar, and Vietnam) through the Mekong Innovative Start-ups in Tourism accelerator. The TA will support the implementation of MIST across two tracks. Track one will invite early stage tourism and travel tech start-ups in ASEAN-4 to apply for the accelerator to build their capacity, provide visibility through the Mekong Tourism Forum (MTF) and provide ongoing mentorship. Track two invites entries from international mature travel tech start-ups with high potential or proven business models with application in either of the ASEAN-4 markets. Successful applicants in both tracks will be connected to relevant officials, potential corporate partners, and investors. The total value of this investment is USD0.2 million (approximately $A0.3 million) to be expensed during the 2017-
